ALGORITMOS¶

Esta parte do documento tem por objetivo documentar o restante do código que é utilizado internamente na API implementada. Esses módulos auxiliares estão dentro da pasta algorithms e repository.

API Exam ML¶

predictor_train

algorithms.challenge_senai.predictor_train.concatXY(x, y, nome)¶

function that merge features with target

Parameters

df – dataframe used

algorithms.challenge_senai.predictor_train.create_model_to_predict_y_train(df_test_train)¶

function that creates a model to predict y_train

Parameters

df_test_train – dataframe used to create a model responsible for predicting y_train

algorithms.challenge_senai.predictor_train.create_test_dataframes_to_train_and_validate()¶

function that separates the test set into a dataset to discover y_train and another to do the actual validation of the solution.

Return df_trainer_test

dataframe to generate the y_train

Return df_test_validation

dataframe to test the solution

algorithms.challenge_senai.predictor_train.predict_y_train(x_train)¶

function that predict y_train

Parameters

x_train – features of train

algorithms.challenge_senai.predictor_train.remove_outliers(cont, df)¶

function that remove outliers

Return cont

contamination tax

Return df

dataframe to apply the solution

algorithms.challenge_senai.predictor_train.round_up(n, decimals=0)¶

function to around

Parameters

  • n – number to around

  • decimals – total of decimals

Return result

rounded numeric value

algorithms.challenge_senai.predictor_train.show_performance(y_test, y_pred)¶

function that show performance comparing original target with predicted target

Parameters

  • y_test – original target

  • y_pred – predicted target

algorithms.challenge_senai.predictor_train.splitFeaturesTarget(df)¶

function that split features of target

Parameters

df – dataframe used

algorithms.challenge_senai.predictor_train.train_model(classifier, df)¶

function that train a generic model with holdout with 20% to test

Parameters

  • classifier – classifier used to train the dataset

  • df – dataframe used to create a model responsible for predicting y_train

predictor_test

algorithms.challenge_senai.predictor_test.avaliate_level_0(df_train_clean_normalized, df_test_real_normalized)¶

This part is responsible for evaluating the quality of base classifiers (or level 0)

Parameters

  • df_train_clean_normalized – dataframe of train normalized without outliers

  • df_test_real_normalized – dataframe of test normalized

algorithms.challenge_senai.predictor_test.avaliate_level_1(df_train_clean_normalized, df_test_real_normalized)¶

This part is responsible for evaluating the quality of ensemble classifiers level 1

Parameters

  • df_train_clean_normalized – dataframe of train normalized without outliers

  • df_test_real_normalized – dataframe of test normalized

algorithms.challenge_senai.predictor_test.avaliate_level_2(df_train_clean_normalized, df_test_real_normalized)¶

This part is responsible for evaluating the quality of stacking (ensemble of ensembles - level 2)

Parameters

  • df_train_clean_normalized – dataframe of train normalized without outliers

  • df_test_real_normalized – dataframe of test normalized

algorithms.challenge_senai.predictor_test.create_and_save_models(df_train_clean_normalized, df_test_real_normalized)¶

Function to create and save models

Parameters

  • df_train_clean_normalized – dataframe of train normalized without outliers

  • df_test_real_normalized – dataframe of test normalized

algorithms.challenge_senai.predictor_test.generate_prediction(x_train, y_train, x_test, model)¶

function that generates prediction

Parameters

  • x_train – features of train

  • y_train – target of train

  • x_test – features of test

  • model – model used

algorithms.challenge_senai.predictor_test.get_config_ensemble_lazy()¶

function with configuration to ensemble of lazy

algorithms.challenge_senai.predictor_test.get_config_ensemble_nn()¶

function with configuration to ensemble of neural network

algorithms.challenge_senai.predictor_test.get_config_ensemble_svm()¶

function with configuration to ensemble of svm

algorithms.challenge_senai.predictor_test.get_config_ensemble_tree()¶

function with configuration to ensemble of tree

algorithms.challenge_senai.predictor_test.normalize_dataframe(df)¶

function that normalize all df, except target

Parameters

df – dataframe to normalize

algorithms.challenge_senai.predictor_test.predictor_row(json)¶

Function generated to be able to predict a single specific line of the dataset

Parameters

json – json of rest api

Serviços Auxiliares¶

repository_service

repository.repository_service.dataset_test_validation_exists()¶

check if parquet file of dataframe test exists

repository.repository_service.dataset_train_exists()¶

check if parquet file of dataframe train exists

repository.repository_service.dataset_trainer_test_exists()¶

check if parquet file of dataframe test exists

repository.repository_service.ensemble_of_ensemble_exists()¶

check if file of ensemble already exists

Returns

True in case of success or False in case of Fail

repository.repository_service.file_exists(folder, name)¶

check if file with name of model exists

Parameters

  • model – model to save

  • folder – folder to save

  • name – name to save

Returns

true or false

repository.repository_service.get_dataset_test(name)¶

check if parquet file of dataframe test exists

repository.repository_service.get_dataset_train()¶

check if parquet file of dataframe train exists

repository.repository_service.get_dfs_from_csv()¶

return dataframes

Returns

x_train, x_test, y_test

repository.repository_service.load_model(folder, level, name)¶

load model

Parameters

name – name to load

Returns

model in case of success or None in case of fail

repository.repository_service.load_model_to_train(name)¶

load model

Parameters

name – name to load

Returns

model in case of success or None in case of fail

repository.repository_service.save_dataframe_test(name, df_teste_real)¶

Parameters

df – dataframe to be save

Returns

True in case of success or False in case of Fail

repository.repository_service.save_dataframe_train(df_train)¶

save dataframe as parquet to directory

Parameters

df – dataframe to be save

Returns

True in case of success or False in case of Fail

repository.repository_service.save_model(model, folder, level, name)¶

save model to directory

Parameters

  • model – model to save

  • folder – folder to save

  • name – name to save

Returns

True in case of success or False in case of Fail

save model to directory

Parameters

  • model – model to save

  • folder – folder to save

  • name – name to save
